thought: To craft a note block, I need to craft crimson planks. The closest recipe to craft crimson planks requires placing a stripped_crimson_hyphae in the crafting table. Therefore I will first move the stripped_crimson_hyphae from slot 17 into the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: note_block

thought: After crafting the crimson planks, I can now craft the note block. First, I need to place oak planks in the crafting table, so I will move them from slot 13 to the crafting table (slots 1, 2, 3).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 4

Ok
act: move from slot 33 to slot 1 with quantity 1
